text: If you want to go ahead with the game idea, I would check if you can use a game engine and research if there are any good ones for Visual Basic. A game engine would certainly help you a lot!
Once you've established that, you could do some tutorial and play a bit with the game engine to get a feeling if you will be able to use it.

Getting an internship or work experience outside of college would be a plus but I don't think they are necessary. If you can show your skills with some projects you did at home that can be equally good. I think the important bit is that you actively get more experience in a related field.
